Couldn't recommend the Little House enough! My partner and I had a wonderful stay here for 2 nights and we already can't wait to come back! The space itself is so cozy and sweet, and it had everything we needed and more to have a comfortable and enjoyable stay. We especially appreciated Karol providing local recommendations, which we tried several of and loved. The surrounding land and area is green, beautiful, tucked away, and peaceful. We enjoyed sitting out and eating and enjoying coffee in the mornings and evenings (with birds always serenading us!) Perfect place for a quiet and relaxing getaway with lots to explore and enjoy in surrounding Hammonton and S. Jersey :)
Great place to stay clean and tidy and comfortable We will definitely choose this place again next time!
Great little place, the grounds were nice, easy to find, comfortable bed and surprisingly large bathroom. We had a great stay.
A comfortable, quiet place to stay. Karol had a list of activities to do, places to go, things to see in the area. It is a great space for up to two people to stay in.

A cozy place to stay while we explored the beautiful Pinelands. The "little" house had plenty of space to relax in the evening, and we also enjoyed eating lunch outside. Everything was comfortable and clean. The check-in was easy and Karol was helpful and clear with the instructions. It's a pretty and peaceful location, surrounded by farms and fields, but at the same time doesn't feel too far from civilization. With the helpful list of recommendations, we enjoyed some great food very close by. It was also easy to get to different parks to hike and learn about the history of the region.
Excellent communication, awesome little house!

The Little House was just as pictured. The property was very private and quiet. The mattress was extremely comfortable, and the the small "kitchen" area had everything I needed for my stay. This is the perfect property for a single traveler, and I will definitely book this property again.

Warm and cozy. Absolutely love it!
Very quiet and peaceful location. This small cabin is a true gem!

One of the best Airbnb stays I've had, and I've had a lot. Beautiful private little house, private outdoor space, fields and stars to gaze at and all the amenities of Hammonton a few minutes drive away. The surrounding area is beautiful too!
A lovely stay! Off the beaten path, but such a beautiful and cozy location.

Karol's Little House is perhaps the coziest place we've ever stayed! It is beautifully finished in construction and materials, beautifully maintained, and decorated in a manner that I found really appealing. I cannot imagine anyone being disappointed in their stay here. Karol is clearly invested in offering a happy place.
Thank you Karol!
